title: Ergo Foundation Transparency Report
summary: The Ergo Foundation has published a transparency report for 2022, providing details on the foundation's governance, operations, and activities. The report covers the previous year and is a continuation of the foundation's commitment to transparency. Key information about the Ergo Foundation and its work is presented in the report.
